property.name: dfs.blocksize
property.description: The default block size for new files, in bytes. You can use the following suffix (case insensitive): k(kilo), m(mega), g(giga), t(tera), p(peta), e(exa) to specify the size (such as 128k, 512m, 1g, etc.), Or provide complete size in bytes (such as 134217728 for 128 MB).

property.name: dfs.merkle.chunksize
property.description: The default chunk size in which the blocks are split, in bytes.

property.name: dfs.merkle.tree.height
property.description: The height of the merkle trees that are constructed from the blocks.

property.name: dfs.zkproofs.challenge.count
property.description: The number of challenges per block to be submitted on block reporting.

property.name: dfs.blockchain.address
property.description: The address of the contract on the blockchain.

property.name: dfs.contract.address
property.description: The address of the contract on the blockchain.

property.name: dfs.client.wallet.pkey
property.description: The address that the client uses to communicate with the blockchain.

property.name: dfs.datanode.wallet.pkey
property.description: The address that the datanode uses to communicate with the blockchain.

property.name: dfs.zokrates.dir.path
property.description: Path to the directory that contains the zokrates executable.
